CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDSeBT (Material Name): Polycrystalline Diamond Sulfide: Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate.
2. PDCTBT (Material Name): Poly(3,4-dichlorothiophene-co-butadiene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate.

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two materials, PCDSeBT and PDCTBT, which are polymers with specific compositions. These materials are identified as the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

PCDSeBT (Material Name): Polycrystalline Diamond Sulfide: Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate.

PDCTBT (Material Name): Poly(3,4-dichlorothiophene-co-butadiene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate.

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions only two entities that clearly refer to Material Names: PCDSeBT and PDCTBT. All other entities in the paragraph, such as "full width at half - maximum," "fwhm," "J SC value," "strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions," and "characteristic," are not Material Names and can be removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT: Polycrystalline Diamond Sulfide: Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate |
| PDCTBT: Poly(3,4-dichlorothiophene-co-butadiene):Benzo[thiophene]Sulfonate |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 In a closer look of the film absorptions , it is also found that the full width at half - maximum ( fwhm ) of PCDSeBT ( 155 nm ) is wider than that of PDCTBT ( 140 nm ) , as a matter of a characteristic of strong intermolecular Se°°°Se interactions , which can potentially further increase J SC value.

Let's think step by step.

1. fwhm (Full width at half-maximum) of PCDSeBT (155 nm)
2. fwhm of PDCTBT (140 nm)
3. J SC value.

These are the property values mentioned in the paragraph. The first two are the full widths at half-maximum for two different materials (PCDSeBT and PDCTBT), and the third one is the J SC value (Junction Short Circuit).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. fwhm of PCDSeBT (155 nm)
2. fwhm of PDCTBT (140 nm)
3. J SC value.

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| fwhm of PDCTBT (140 nm) |
